subject: Baseball
Labor and Jobs
Pensions and Retirement Plans
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Jim Qualls, remembered as the man who broke up Tom Seaver’s perfect game in 1969, is one of many former players who will benefit modestly from a new financial agreement.
snippet: Jim Qualls, remembered as the man who broke up Tom Seaver’s perfect game in 1969, is one of many former players who will benefit modestly from a new financial agreement.
